summary: Relating to contracting indebtedness; authorizing the issuance and sale of limited tax general obligation refunding bonds and unlimited tax general obligation refunding bonds, in one or more series, for the purposes of paying all or part of the costs of refunding, or refunding and defeasing, all or a portion of the City's outstanding limited tax general obligation bonds and unlimited tax general obligation bonds and of paying all or part of the costs of issuance and sale of the bonds; providing for terms, covenants and manner of sale of the bonds; and providing for agreements and activities in connection with the disposition of the proceeds of the bonds.
